Original title: Kill the Messenger
Year: 2014
Duration: 112 min.
Country: United States

Synopsis
Based on the true story of American journalist Gary Webb, who revealed the CIA connections with the world of drugs, and showed that black neighborhoods in the country were inundated with crack by a drug intended to supply money and arms to the CIA.
